com.teamdev.jxmaps

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxmaps.MapObject
      • com.teamdev.jxmaps.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Polygon
extends MapObject
    Represents a polygon (like a polyline) defines a series of connected coordinates in an ordered sequence; additionally, polygons form a closed loop and define a filled region.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polygon(Map map)
      Creates new Polygon object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getDraggable()
      Returns whether this shape can be dragged by the user.
      boolean getEditable()
      Returns whether this shape can be edited by the user.
      LatLng[] getPath()
      Retrieves the first path.
      LatLng[][] getPaths()
      Retrieves the paths for this polygon.
      boolean getVisible()
      Returns whether this polygon is visible on the map.
      void remove()
      Removes polygon from the map.
      void setDraggable(boolean value)
      If set to true, the user can drag this shape over the map.
      void setEditable(boolean value)
      If set to true, the user can edit this shape by dragging the control points shown at the vertices and on each segment.
      void setOptions(PolygonOptions options)
      Sets new options for current shape.
      void setPath(LatLng[] values)
      Sets the first path.
      void setPaths(LatLng[][] items)
      Sets the path for this polygon.
      void setVisible(boolean value)
      Hides this poly if set to false.

        public boolean getEditable()
        Returns whether this shape can be edited by the user.
        Returns:

      • getVisible

        public boolean getVisible()
        Returns whether this polygon is visible on the map.
        Returns:
        property value

      • setDraggable

        public void setDraggable(boolean value)
        If set to true, the user can drag this shape over the map. The geodesic property defines the mode of dragging.
        Parameters:
        value - new value

      • setEditable

        public void setEditable(boolean value)
        If set to true, the user can edit this shape by dragging the control points shown at the vertices and on each segment.
        Parameters:
        value - new value

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean value)
        Hides this poly if set to false.
        Parameters:
        value - new value

      • setOptions

        public void setOptions(PolygonOptions options)
        Sets new options for current shape.
        Parameters:
        options - new options object

      • getPath

        @Nullable
public LatLng[] getPath()
        Retrieves the first path.
        Returns:
        array of coords that represents path

      • getPaths

        @Nullable
public LatLng[][] getPaths()
        Retrieves the paths for this polygon.
        Returns:
        array of paths that represents polygon. each path is represented as array of coords.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Removes polygon from the map.

      • setPath

        public void setPath(LatLng[] values)
        Sets the first path. See PolygonOptions for more details.
        Parameters:
        values - array of LatLng values that represents the new path

      • setPaths

        public void setPaths(LatLng[][] items)
        Sets the path for this polygon.
        Parameters:
        items - collection of paths
